title: Healthy Assassins
body: So I remember Riot saying something about making assassins healthy eg not 100-0 in 1 second so far they've removed silences, nerfed damages(LB), given counter play to zeds tower diving on low hp, but then theres ekko who can proc his w while zhoyneds(hes untargettable WTF) and Diana who can be 0/3 and still 100-0 you with her combo on less then half hp and these 2 are "healthy assassins" oh then theres annies passive

replies.body:
Healthy Assassins?
That's oxymoronic. 

Assassin's are unhealthy by basic design. The most basic outline is that they either delete you or you delete them. It's a little bit like feast or famine style. It's much harder to create an Assassin than a Bruiser/Fighter champion because of the unstable nature of Assassin play styles.

It's not about reducing their damage. Assassins are quite litterally "the guys that drop you dead in a matter of instants". Otherwise they're fighters, brawlers, mages or the like.
Healthy assassins means simply giving them a weak spot, meaning they can kill you instantly BUT.
But, they are out of spells and can't keep up the fight.
But, they don't have an escape.
But, they can't stop you from killing them back if you survive.
Things like that. They won't have ALL those weaknesses, but something on that line, you'll always find it.

A healthy champion isn't a weak champion, it's a champion with BOTH strengths and weaknesses.

I dont seem to be able to delete full health fools with ahri since the dfg days.

I do miss the days of ambushing a lone lane pusher and deleting them. Such fond memories

Diana is healthy because she has no way back out (Zed and LB both have this) sure she 100-0'd you, but now she is in the middle of your team.

Ekko is rarely seen as an assassin over a tank, and fact is he's outplayed you if your in his W.

And Annie has a complete lack of mobility and can't engage without flash.

The 3 you mentioned are healthy because of reason's outside 100-0.

Because old Zed and LB used to 100-0 you and then go back to where they were and be like "I'm totally balanced"
The only problem about Diana's counterplay is, in lane and 1v1's, she isn't in the middle of your team after she 100-0'd you, you're just dead.

In lane if that's happened, you probably fed her.

In 1v1's, why are you 1v1ing her unless your the tank?
